text: "Straight Up" is a song by American singer and dancer Paula Abdul from her debut studio album, Forever Your Girl (1988). It was written and produced by Elliot Wolff. Virgin Records released the song as the album's third single on November 22, 1988. ==Track listings and formats== * Australia 12-inch single # "Straight Up" (Ultimix) # "Opposites Attract" (1990 mix) # "Straight Up" (single version) * French 12-inch vinyl # "Straight Up" (12-inch remix) # "Straight Up" (Power mix) # "Straight Up" (House mix) # "Straight Up" (Marley Marl mix) * US 12-inch single # "Straight Up" (12-inch remix) # "Straight Up" (Power mix) # "Straight Up" (House mix) * Japanese mini-CD single # "Straight Up" # "Cold Hearted" ==Credits and personnel== Credits are adapted from the liner notes of Forever Your Girl. * Elliot Wolff – songwriter, producer, arrangement, LinnDrum programming, synthesizer programming, synthesizers * Keith "K.C."
